page.title: 05MRS GRANT,CASTLETOWN
page.content: Mrs Pat Grant was nominated for Business Woman of the Year in 1983 because of her part in the rapid growth of the factory which started from scratch ten years ago. She is the Marketing Director,Chief Buyer and Personnel Director of{Norfrost}Ltd. Mrs Grant believes women can be better in business than men because women look at a job more humanely, whilst some men only look at the money and the end results. The company provides free transport from{Morrison's, Castletown}and a breakfast and two course lunch from {The Royal Hotel,Thurso,}thus helping {to }provide work locally. She has been to many countries on business trips,and her success is based on hard work.
